issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: Druid Vectorize Reader is not using the correct input size

status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
Adde the following query to Druid test  ql/src/test/queries/clientpositive/druidmini_expressions.q

{code}
select count(distinct `__time`, cint) from (select * from druid_table_alltypesorc) as src;

{code}

leads to error \{code} 2018-11-21T07:36:39,449 ERROR [main] QTestUtil: Client execution failed with error code = 40000 running "\{code}

with exception stack 

{code}

fields.summary: Calcite Rule HiveExpandDistinctAggregatesRule seems throwing IndexOutOfBoundsException
